data.event: The current mayor is Harry J. Klein, who took office in 1991.
Over the next hundred years the area remained largely undeveloped, though several times large plans were laid out for the area, never to come to fruition.

event.title: were never realized due to an economic depression in 1893

data.event: In the late 19th century a railroad investor named A. B. Stickney planned a large railroad transfer center which included what became the northern part of Burbank, but his ideas were never realized due to an economic depression in 1893.
